attributes.action: Remove trollies from big chain supermarkets and only allow 1 basket per customer
attributes.background: There is no food or cleaning products at the supermarket, people with fussy children are finding it very difficult to find food their children will eat. With everything else that is going on this is only adding more anxiety and worry for people

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for individual retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.  In any case, it could also prevent people with disabilities or elderly people from being able to access groceries. 

You may like to sign this petition on limiting purchases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300766

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
